original_text: while Moses went up to God. The Lord called to him out of the mountain, saying, “Thus you shall say to the house of Jacob, and tell the people of Israel:
korean_text: 모세가 하나님 앞에 올라가니 여호와께서 산에서 그를 불러 말씀하시되 너는 이같이 야곱의 집에 말하고 이스라엘 자손들에게 말하라

sentences.original_text: while Moses went up to God.
The Lord called to him out of the mountain
Thus you shall say to the house of Jacob,
and tell the people of Israel:
